analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/31/0x1d1c828239c3986fc6be89b6d54964b54fc9231f.sol:
	Contract PORNCASH has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/31/0x1d1c828239c3986fc6be89b6d54964b54fc9231f.sol#215)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/31/0x1d1c828239c3986fc6be89b6d54964b54fc9231f.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/31/0x1d1c828239c3986fc6be89b6d54964b54fc9231f.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/31/0x1d1c828239c3986fc6be89b6d54964b54fc9231f.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
